alert.note: Alert for Red Willow (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 26 at 12:07PM CST until December 27 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST WEDNESDAY... ...BLIZZARD WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to three inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...In Kansas, Decatur and Sheridan Counties. In Nebraska, Red Willow County. * WHEN...Until 6 AM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds will lower slightly through the afternoon hours. Blizzard conditions may still occur at times but should be intermittent if they do occur.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
